title: Looking for Love... Type Treatments.
content:
I am looking for cool designs of the word Love! Hopefully a beautiful script or something fancy looking.

I am trying to find beautiful designs for a lady friend's anklet tatoo. Thanks!  
-Jesse

comments.content:
This is a lovely one from Alexander Girard.  
 [http://farm1.static.flickr.com/48/164324669\_478f226308\_o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419093115/http:/farm1.static.flickr.com/48/164324669_478f226308_o.jpg "http://farm1.static.flickr.com/48/164324669\_478f226308\_o.jpg")

Thats cool! Thanks ill sans :)

here are some more i've found... It is proving difficult so far online.

I believe the last photo is from Seb Lester:
